attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For the past 66 years Bruce Forsyth has been entertaining the world. 

Even though he is a CBE its time we honoured this fabulous man for being Britain's greatest entertainer. From the Generation Game, to the inimitable catch phrases Bruce has been part of everyone's life - you could say that Bruce is Mr Saturday night.

So I am asking to bestow Mr Forsyth with the Knighthood he deserves and then we can all say Knight to see you to see you Knight!!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
